external.gw.plugin.processing

Interface IProcessesPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlugin
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface IProcessesPlugin
extends IPlugin
    If this plugin is implemented and the given implementation will be delegated to either create a new batch process a system level batch process.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BatchProcess createBatchProcess(BatchProcessType type, java.lang.Object[] args)
      Deprecated. 
      This method will be called after platform does not succeeded in finding a batch process If the customer has defined a batch process, they should construct that process and return it from this method.

    • Method Detail

      • createBatchProcess

        BatchProcess createBatchProcess(BatchProcessType type,
                              java.lang.Object[] args)
        Deprecated. 
        This method will be called after platform does not succeeded in finding a batch process If the customer has defined a batch process, they should construct that process and return it from this method. A customer can define a batch process by extending external.gw.processes.BatchProcessBase
        Parameters:
        type - the BatchProcessType
        args - the args to be passed to the batch process
